sentences.sentence: He spoke revealingly about his problems.
sentences.translation: 他坦率地谈论他的问题。

sentences.sentence: One mill worker who finally quit complained revealingly about "obedience to the ding-dong of the bell—just as though we are so many living machines".
sentences.translation: 一位最终辞职的工厂工人真心实意地抱怨，他们“要听从于那些叮叮当当的钟表，像是被当成了活生生的机器一样”。

sentences.sentence: Revealingly, England’s main reason for optimism is an Italian, the manager Fabio Capello.
sentences.translation: 一种具有揭示性的说发是，英格兰的这种乐观主义的主要原因是一个意大利人，主教练法比奥•卡佩罗。
